exceptions.exn: In environment r, n : nat f : nat -> nat m : nat g : nat -> nat H : 2 <= r H0 : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j H1 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j H2 : ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) The term "r" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "2 <= ?p".
